Name: Echoes of the Past: The Revenge of the Witch Collector's Edition
About the game: Save the kingdom of Orion in Echoes of the Past: The Revenge of the Witch! Once again black powers have seized the land and this time the witch is more determined than ever to take her revenge on you. The entire city is gripped by fear and it's up to you to save them, and yourself. Exorcize the evil and defeat the witch once and for all! Exciting gameplay Unique mini-games and challenging puzzles Beautiful graphics, music and sound effects Bonus gameplay Integrated Strategy Guide
